CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y -qq apache2 libapache2-mod-php7.0 &&   echo "\nServerName localhost" >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf &&   rm /etc/apache2/sites-enabled/*default*.conf &&   echo "umask 002" >> /etc/apache2/envvars &&   a2enmod rewrite php7.0 deflate &&   usermod -a -G www-data quitoque &&   apt-get -qq -y autoremove && apt-get -qq -y autoclean &&   apt-get -qq -y clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
